    DialogueBox(String title, String text)

      Sets the current dialogue box title
      Parameters:
      title - - title to be set

      Note: if title is null or empty, the title is cleared

    • setDialogueTexture

      public void setDialogueTexture(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
      Sets the current dialogue box texture
      Parameters:
      texture - - texture to be set

      Note: if texture is null, no change to the current texture is made

    • setDialogueImage

      public void setDialogueImage(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture image)
      Sets the current dialogue box image
      Parameters:
      image - - image to be set

      Note: if image is null, the dialogue box image is not drawn
